  • Constructor Details

    • InterestEvent

      public InterestEvent(Map<NovaPlayer,Map<Economy,Double>> previousBalances, Map<NovaPlayer,Map<Economy,Double>> interestAmount)
      Constructs an InterestEvent.

      This Event will calculate getNewBalance(NovaPlayer) on its own
      Parameters:
      previousBalances - A Map of Players to the economies affected and their previous balances
      interestAmount - A Map of Players to the economies affected and the amount added
